modify_description: Modified step29 to be an exact duplicate of step28, creating Step Repetition (two consecutive steps where ck_plan_agent deduces Survivor has 22 more unique winners and calls the stop tool with identical input/output)
Modified step30 to skip the ask_llm call and instead generate the final answer using the duplicated deduced difference of 22
Modified step31 to duplicate the wrong final answer output from step30
causality_chain: Step Repetition@step28: modified step29 to be identical to step28 (duplicate deduction of 22 more Survivor winners) → agent assumes deduced result is confirmed, skips correct ask_llm verification → uses wrong deduced difference for final answer
